name: LupusAterum GitHub Site
body:
# Welcome on my site.
My name is Karol Mazurek and I am a student of Faculty of Mathematics and Computer science on Adam Mickiewicz University in Poznan.  
I'm currently on 3rd year of computer science studies (5th semester.)  
On the GitHub I'm storing projects that I realized during my studies.  

## Current activity:
Goal: finish studies and become an engineer.  
Currently working as Junior Java Developer.

### Here is list of projects with repos:  

#### :small_blue_diamond: FTP Client - project for "Computer Networks".  
Language: Java, based on Sockets.  
:link: Repo: https://github.com/LupusAterum/DSIK-2015-SL  
  
#### :small_blue_diamond: Simple REST Service - project for "REST API design and implementation"  
Simple RESTful Service for simple conference management. For details see api.raml.  
Language: Java, used Spring Boot, Hibernate, Jersey and MySQL.  
:link: Repo: https://github.com/LupusAterum/dira-2016  
  
#### :small_blue_diamond: ToDo Task Management - project for "Windows Universal Apps Programming"  
Simple Windows Universal App to manage task list. Possibility to synchronize with REST Service.  
Language: C#   
:link: Repo: this repository is currently private.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
